sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Finished with my woman 'cause she couldn't help me with my mind
People think I'm insane because I am frowning all the time

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: All day long I think of things but nothing seems to satisfy
Think I'll lose my mind if I don't find something to pacify

sections.name: Pont
lyrics: Can you help me, occupy my brain?

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: I need someone to show me the things in life that I can't find
I can't see the things that make true happiness, I must be blind

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Make a joke and I will sigh and you will laugh and I will cry
Happiness I cannot feel and love to me is so unreal

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: And so as you hear these words telling you now of my state
I tell you to enjoy life I wish I could but it's too late
